content: {A拍手}Ahem... <style=SizeBig>Friends!</style>
info: 流星雨结束-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: Our gathering is about to come to an end. Thanks for being here! These joyful moments may be fleeting, but that only makes them all the more precious.
info: 流星雨结束-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: {A挠头}I often wonder, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>... Do you already have an idea of what kind of planet you want to nurture? And what can I do to help you?

content: But when I look at Esassani... Yesterday, she dreamed of nurturing a planet with routes to every place, so she could travel far and wide.

content: Ah, of course, if you feel tired during today's gathering, you can always let me know...

content: Whenever I see a shooting star, it reminds me of my old friends. I wonder how they're all doing, hoho!

content: {A想象}Maybe our time apart is its own kind of reassurance, making each reunion even more precious, just like how this moment will be worth remembering.

content: {A灵光一现}So I think, perhaps your life, your planet, are meant to be just that — undefined and unplanned.

content: Every day brings new ideas and new encounters. Here, you live freely and at peace, and thus, you've already grown the planet that your heart desires.
